name: opspilot
description: Fast Kubernetes IDE with autonomous AI debugging. Tauri + Rust + Ollama for read-only incident analysis and native performance.

scripts.build:quick: npm run build:web && npm run build:rust
scripts.build:app: npm run build:web && SKIP_JENKINS=1 tauri build
scripts.build: npm run build:python & npm run build:web & wait && SKIP_JENKINS=1 tauri build
scripts.export:diagrams: mmdc -i docs/diagrams/system-architecture.mmd -o docs/diagrams/system-architecture.png && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/component-architecture.mmd -o docs/diagrams/component-architecture.png && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/controller-health-seq.mmd -o docs/diagrams/controller-health-seq.png && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/jira-connect.mmd -o docs/diagrams/jira-connect.png && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/github-test.mmd -o docs/diagrams/github-test.png && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/mcp-test.mmd -o docs/diagrams/mcp-test.png
scripts.export:diagrams:svg: mmdc -i docs/diagrams/system-architecture.mmd -o docs/diagrams/system-architecture.svg && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/component-architecture.mmd -o docs/diagrams/component-architecture.svg && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/controller-health-seq.mmd -o docs/diagrams/controller-health-seq.svg && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/jira-connect.mmd -o docs/diagrams/jira-connect.svg && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/github-test.mmd -o docs/diagrams/github-test.svg && mmdc -i docs/diagrams/mcp-test.mmd -o docs/diagrams/mcp-test.svg
